1.18.2.1.1.5a: Fix crash on servers when a player is offline
1.18.2.1.1.5b: Add support for slim player models, fix elytra rendering and nametag bugs for zombie players
1.18.2.1.1.5c: fix incompatibility with some mods that change respawning
1.18.2.1.1.5d: fix crashes caused by a null pointer exception with zombie players and conversions
1.18.2.1.1.5e: fix crash when zombie players can't properly select which player model to use, fix issues with drowned player names
1.18.2.1.1.6a: fix mixin config preventing mod load
1.18.2.1.2.0: add datapack support, player arguments for commands, piglin infection
1.18.2.1.2.0a: fix wrong tables being loaded by hordes
1.18.2.1.2.1: fix various bugs, add fallback horde table and better error logging
1.18.2.1.2.1a: fixed errors in default table, zombie horse speed and config crashes
1.18.2.1.2.3: backport 1.20 checks to prevent horde spawning in water
